datasheets.name: Aleya
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Prosecutors ■ Vigilators ■ Witchseekers
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Somnus.
wargear: None

other.name: Tactical Perception
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.

other.name: Tenacious Spirit
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that unit is Below Half-strength.

other.name: Daughter of the Abyss
other.description: This model has the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

datasheets.name: Allarus Custodians
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: balistus grenade launcher; guardian spear.
wargear: Any number of models can each have their guardian spear replaced with 1 castellan axe.
1 model’s guardian spear can be replaced with 1 vexilla and 1 misericordia.

wargear.name: Vexilla
wargear.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

other.name: Slayers of Tyrants
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Character, Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

other.name: From Golden Light
other.description: Once per battle, at the end of your opponenet’s turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield. In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

datasheets.name: Anathema Psykana Rhino
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: storm bolter; armoured tracks.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 hunter-killer missile.
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 12 Anathema Psykana Infantry models.

other.name: Daughters of the Abyss
other.description: This model has the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

other.name: Self Repair
other.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.

datasheets.name: Blade Champion
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Custodian Guard ■ Custodian Wardens
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: vaultswords.
wargear: None

other.name: Martial Inspiration
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit. In addition, once per battle, this model’s unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

other.name: Legacy of Combat
other.description: You can target this model’s unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

datasheets.name: Custodian Guard
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: guardian spear.
wargear: Any number of models can each have their guardian spear replaced with 1 sentinel blade and 1 praesidium shield.
1 model’s guardian spear can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 vexilla and 1 misericordia ◦ 1 vexilla, 1 misericordia and 1 praesidium shield

wargear.name: Praesidium Shield
wargear.description: Add 1 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.

wargear.name: Vexilla
wargear.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

other.name: Stand Vigil
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

other.name: Sentinel Storm
other.description: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, it can shoot again.

datasheets.name: Custodian Wardens
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: guardian spear.
wargear: Any number of models can each have their guardian spear replaced with 1 castellan axe.
1 model can be equipped with 1 vexilla.

wargear.name: Vexilla
wargear.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

other.name: Resolute Will
other.description: While a Character is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

other.name: Living Fortress
other.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this unit can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

datasheets.name: Knight-centura
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Prosecutors ■ Vigilators ■ Witchseekers
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: executioner greatblade.
wargear: This model’s executioner greatblade can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 master-crafted boltgun ◦ 1 Witchseeker flamer

other.name: Seeker’s Instincts
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit and add 2 to Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

other.name: Daughter of the Abyss
other.description: This model has the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

other.name: Corner the Quarry
other.description: Each time an enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) that is within Engagement Range of this model’s unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

datasheets.name: Prosecutors
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: boltgun; close combat weapon.
wargear: None

other.name: Daughters of the Abyss
other.description: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

other.name: Purity of Execution
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a Psyker unit, that attack has the [PRECISION] and [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] abilities.

datasheets.name: Shield-captain
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Custodian Guard ■ Custodian Wardens
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: guardian spear.
wargear: This model’s guardian spear can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 castellan axe ◦ 1 sentinel blade ◦ 1 sentinel blade and 1 praesidium shield

wargear.name: Praesidium shield
wargear.description: Add 1 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.

other.name: Master of the Stances
other.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select one Ka’tah Stance. Until the end of the phase, that stance is active for this model’s unit in addition to the one that is active. Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, all stances are active for this model’s unit until the end of the phase.

other.name: Strategic Mastery
other.description: Once per battle round, you can select one model from your army with this ability. That model’s unit can be targeted with a Stratagem for 0CP, even if that Stratagem has already targeted another unit from your army this phase.

datasheets.name: Shield-captain In Allarus Terminator Armour
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Allarus Custodians
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: balistus grenade launcher; guardian spear.
wargear: This model’s guardian spear can be replaced with 1 castellan axe.

other.name: Defiant to the Last
other.description: If this model is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

other.name: Strategic Mastery
other.description: Once per battle round, you can select one model from your army with this ability and target that model’s unit with a Stratagem for 0CP, even if that Stratagem has already been used on another unit from your army this phase.

datasheets.name: Shield-captain On Dawneagle Jetbike
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Vertus Praetors
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: salvo launcher; interceptor lance.
wargear: This model’s salvo launcher can be replaced with 1 Vertus hurricane bolter.

other.name: Sweeping Advance
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time that unit Consolidates, each model in that unit can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". In addition, once per battle, at the end of the Fight phase, if this model’s unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can Fall Back as if it were your Movement phase or, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move as if it were your Movement phase.

other.name: Strategic Mastery
other.description: Once per battle round, you can select one model from your army with this ability and target that model’s unit with a Stratagem for 0CP, even if that Stratagem has already been used on another unit from your army this phase.

datasheets.name: Trajann Valoris
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Custodian Guard ■ Custodian Wardens
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Watcher’s Axe.
wargear: None

other.name: Captain-General
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the characteristics of models in that unit and/or to any roll or test made for models in that unit (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

other.name: Moment Shackle
other.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, you can select one of the following to take effect until the end of the phase: ■  This model’s Watcher’s Axe melee weapon has an Attacks characteristic of 12. ■  This model has a 2+ invulnerable save. ■ Models in this model’s unit have the Fights First ability.

special.name: SUPREME COMMANDER
special.description: If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.

datasheets.name: Valerian
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Custodian Guard ■ Custodian Wardens
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Gnosis.
wargear: None

other.name: Golden Laurels
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a melee attack targets that unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

other.name: Hero of Lion’s Gate
other.description: Once per battle round, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll or one saving throw made for this model. In addition, once per battle, after making a Hit roll, Wound roll or saving throw for this model, you can change the result of that roll to an unmodified 6.

datasheets.name: Venerable Contemptor Dreadnought
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: combi-bolter; multi-melta; Contemptor combat weapon.
wargear: This model’s multi-melta can be replaced with 1 Kheres-pattern assault cannon.

other.name: Unyielding Ancient
other.description: The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability. Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.

datasheets.name: Venerable Land Raider
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 godhammer lascannons; twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 hunter-killer missile.
This model can be equipped with 1 storm bolter.
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 6 Adeptus Custodes Infantry models.

other.name: Assault Ramp
other.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Vertus Praetors
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: salvo launcher; interceptor lance.
wargear: Any number of models can each have their salvo launcher replaced with 1 Vertus hurricane bolter.

other.name: Turbo-boost
other.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

other.name: Quicksilver Execution
other.description: Once per battle, after this unit ends an Advance move, you can select one enemy unit (excluding Monster and Vehicle units) that it moved over during that move, then roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 2+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

datasheets.name: Vigilators
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: executioner greatblade.
wargear: None

other.name: Daughters of the Abyss
other.description: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

other.name: Deft Parry
other.description: Each time a melee attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Witchseekers
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Witchseeker flamer; close combat weapon.
wargear: None

other.name: Daughters of the Abyss
other.description: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

other.name: Sanctified Flames
other.description: Each time this unit shoots, after it has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.
